name: CKModifyRecordsOperation.RecordSavePolicy
desc: Constants that indicate which policy to apply when saving records.

items.name: case ifServerRecordUnchanged
items.desc: A policy that instructs CloudKit to only proceed if the record’s change tag matches that of the server’s copy.

items.name: case changedKeys
items.desc: A policy that instructs CloudKit to save only the fields of a record that contain changes.

items.name: case allKeys
items.desc: A policy that instructs CloudKit to save all keys of a record, even those without changes.
